title: Strings
description: Whether we know it or not, we are all connected. Invisible Strings hold and bind us all together, but what happens when the Strings of reality get worn down, frayed or even snap..? Within lies 33 tales in which dark forces lay in wait for those such opportunities... Come, dive in, and see the horrors that befall when Strings become unravelled...
author: Darren Gallagher
